src:
【Beauty Within】11 如何治療痘痘

06 Nov 2019, 23:35

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】【Beauty Within】11 如何治療痘痘：我們知道痤瘡是可能發生的最令人困惑的事情之一。 今天，我們將討論不同的痤瘡產品，例如斑點治療，粉刺貼和乾燥乳液，並告訴大家它們是如何工作的！



 
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701544.html
text:
【Beauty Within】11 How to treat acne

06 Nov 2019, 23:35

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 07, 2019] [Beauty Within] 11 How to treat acne: We know that acne is one of the most confusing things that can happen. Today, we will discuss different acne products, such as spot treatments, acne patches and dry lotions, and tell everyone how they work!




This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/06/a102701544.html
